title: How we caused a route leak - anatomy of a routing incident
synopsis: a talk about how an ISP can accidentially break the internet.

speakers.name: Silvan Michael Gebhardt
speakers.bio: System and Network Engineer from Central Europe, recently migrated to the cold north. Networking since more than a decate, and more than 25 years on Linux. Interests are with Security, Networking, Business Networking, as well as getting out to nature and walking my finnish lapphund-pup.
